ayahs.textUthmani: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۖ وَقَدْ كَانُوا۟ يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَـٰلِمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: خَـٰشِعَةً [Humbled] أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ [their eyes] تَرْهَقُهُمْ [will cover them] ذِلَّةٌۭ ۖ [humiliation] وَقَدْ [And indeed] كَانُوا۟ [they were] يُدْعَوْنَ [called] إِلَى [to] ٱلسُّجُودِ [prostrate] وَهُمْ [while they] سَـٰلِمُونَ [(were) sound]
ayahs.transliteration: KhashiAAatan absaruhumtarhaquhum thillatun waqad kanoo yudAAawna ilaassujoodi wahum salimoon

ayahs.textUthmani: فَذَرْنِى وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ ۖ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَذَرْنِى [So leave Me] وَمَن [and whoever] يُكَذِّبُ [denies] بِهَـٰذَا [this] ٱلْحَدِيثِ ۖ [Statement] سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم [We will progressively lead them] مِّنْ [from] حَيْثُ [where] لَا [not] يَعْلَمُونَ [they know]
ayahs.transliteration: Fatharnee waman yukaththibubihatha alhadeethi sanastadrijuhum min haythula yaAAlamoon

ayahs.wordByWord: وَأُمْلِى [And I will give respite] لَهُمْ ۚ [to them] إِنَّ [Indeed] كَيْدِى [My plan] مَتِينٌ [(is) firm]

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ [you ask them] أَجْرًۭا [a payment] فَهُم [so they] مِّن [from] مَّغْرَمٍۢ [(the) debt] مُّثْقَلُونَ [(are) burdened]
ayahs.transliteration: Am tas-aluhum ajran fahum min maghraminmuthqaloon

ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] عِندَهُمُ [(is) with them] ٱلْغَيْبُ [the unseen] فَهُمْ [so they] يَكْتُبُونَ [write it]

ayahs.textUthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَٱصْبِرْ [So be patient] لِحُكْمِ [for (the) decision] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] وَلَا [and (do) not] تَكُن [be] كَصَاحِبِ [like (the) companion] ٱلْحُوتِ [(of) the fish] إِذْ [when] نَادَىٰ [he called out] وَهُوَ [while he] مَكْظُومٌۭ [(was) distressed]
ayahs.transliteration: Fasbir lihukmi rabbikawala takun kasahibi alhooti ith nadawahuwa makthoom

ayahs.textUthmani: لَّوْلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعْمَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: لَّوْلَآ [If not] أَن [that] تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ [overtook him] نِعْمَةٌۭ [a Favor] مِّن [from] رَّبِّهِۦ [his Lord] لَنُبِذَ [surely he would have been thrown] بِٱلْعَرَآءِ [onto (the) naked shore] وَهُوَ [while he] مَذْمُومٌۭ [(was) blamed]
ayahs.transliteration: Lawla an tadarakahu niAAmatunmin rabbihi lanubitha bilAAara-i wahuwa mathmoom

words.translation: surely he would have been thrown

ayahs.wordByWord: فَٱجْتَبَـٰهُ [But chose him] رَبُّهُۥ [his Lord] فَجَعَلَهُۥ [and made him] مِنَ [of] ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ [the righteous]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجْنُونٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِن [And indeed] يَكَادُ [would almost] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieve] لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ [surely make you slip] بِأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ [with their look] لَمَّا [when] سَمِعُوا۟ [they hear] ٱلذِّكْرَ [the Message] وَيَقُولُونَ [and they say] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] لَمَجْنُونٌۭ [(is) surely mad]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-in yakadu allatheenakafaroo layuzliqoonaka bi-absarihim lamma samiAAooaththikra wayaqooloona innahu lamajnoon

ayahs.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] هُوَ [it (is)] إِلَّا [but] ذِكْرٌۭ [a Reminder] لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ [to the worlds]
وَمَآ [And what] أَدْرَىٰكَ [will make you know] مَا [what] ٱلْحَآقَّةُ [(is) the Inevitable Reality]
كَذَّبَتْ [Denied] ثَمُودُ [Thamud] وَعَادٌۢ [and Aad] بِٱلْقَارِعَةِ [the Striking Calamity]
فَأَمَّا [So as for] ثَمُودُ [Thamud] فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ [they were destroyed] بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ [by the overpowering (blast)]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَمَّا [And as for] عَادٌۭ [Aad] فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ [they were destroyed] بِرِيحٍۢ [by a wind] صَرْصَرٍ [screaming] عَاتِيَةٍۢ [violent]

ayahs.textUthmani: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: سَخَّرَهَا [Which He imposed] عَلَيْهِمْ [upon them] سَبْعَ [(for) seven] لَيَالٍۢ [nights] وَثَمَـٰنِيَةَ [and eight] أَيَّامٍ [days] حُسُومًۭا [(in) succession] فَتَرَى [so you would see] ٱلْقَوْمَ [the people] فِيهَا [therein] صَرْعَىٰ [fallen] كَأَنَّهُمْ [as if they were] أَعْجَازُ [trunks] نَخْلٍ [(of) date-palms] خَاوِيَةٍۢ [hollow]
ayahs.transliteration: Sakhkharaha AAalayhim sabAAa layalinwathamaniyata ayyamin husooman fataraalqawma feeha sarAAa kaannahum aAAjazunakhlin khawiya

ayahs.wordByWord: فَهَلْ [Then do] تَرَىٰ [you see] لَهُم [of them] مِّنۢ [any] بَاقِيَةٍۢ [remains]
